front.title: The IPv6 Router Advertisement Option for NTP Configuration

abstract.t: This document defines a new ND option, called the NTPS option, thatcontains the Server location information of Network Time Protocolversion 4[draft-ntpv4] or greater. Therefore, hosts can get suchinformation in the same RA message transporting the information of IPaddress configuration. In this spec, both ND transport mechanisms(i.e., advertisements and solicitations) are considered.
